import React from 'react'; import { RText } from '../../../../../components/Controls'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap4-modal'; import Constants from '../../../../../utils/Constants'; import FormReactSelect from '../../../../../components/FormReactSelect'; import Libs from '../../../../../utils/Libs'; import RowItemMoveDevice from './RowItemMoveDevice'; export default function MoveDevicePopup() { var { curItem, curItemProject, dataListProject, dataYear, dataConfigRevenue, dataList } = this.state; const { t } = this.props; var RowItemMoveDevices = null; console.log("dataList: ", dataList); if (Libs.isArrayData(dataList)) { RowItemMoveDevices = dataList.map((item, index) => { return ( ); }) } return (
{t('project.MoveDevice_title')}: {curItemProject.name}

}
